form.label: Performance Management Browser
form.description: Choose an application to view performance management data

input.label: Select an Application:
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism | stats dc by appName, appId

search.query: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmEndpointsLatency" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<ENDPOINTS>.*?)\",(?<LATENCY>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -LATENCY | table ENDPOINTS, LATENCY

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmEndpointsVolume" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<ENDPOINTS>.*?)\",(?<VOLUME>\d+\.\d)"|sort -VOLUME | table ENDPOINTS, VOLUME

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmEndpointsErrors" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<ENDPOINTS>.*?)\",(?<ERRORS>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -ERRORS | table ENDPOINTS, ERRORS

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmEndpointsData" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<ENDPOINTS>.*?)\",(?<DATA>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -DATA | table ENDPOINTS, DATA

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmServicesLatency" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<SERVICES>.*?)\",(?<LATENCY>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -LATENCY | table SERVICES, LATENCY

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmServicesVolume" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?\".*?\")\,(?\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?.*?)\",(?\d+)"|sort -VOLUME | table SERVICES, VOLUME

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmServicesErrors" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<SERVICES>.*?)\",(?<ERRORS>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -ERRORS | table SERVICES, ERRORS

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmServicesData" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<SERVICES>.*?)\",(?<DATA>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -DATA | table SERVICES, DATA
